title: FS: T206 The Twinight Collection Poster
author: Andy Sandler

posts.post_title: FS: T206 The Twinight Collection Poster
posts.post_content:
Hi!  I have available for sale the Twinight Collection The Monster Turns 100 Celebrating the T206 Set Poster from the 30th National Sports Collectors Convention July 29 - August 2, 2009.  This large poster would look great framed.  Yours for just $9 postpaid.  Any interest?
Thanks, Andy Sandler    [url]alwysyakn@aol.com[/url]
